amendment.description: To clarify the treatment of net operating loss in calculating tax attributes under section 108 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 648 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 648 proposed by Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S6442-6443; text: CR S6442) To clarify the treatment of net operating loss in calculating tax attributes under section 108 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 648 proposed by Senator Santorum.
